abstract: The F.D.I.C. unanimously approved an initial version of the Volcker Rule to restrict proprietary trading by banks. The S.E.C. is scheduled to vote on it on Wednesday.
snippet: The F.D.I.C. unanimously approved an initial version of the Volcker Rule to restrict proprietary trading by banks. The S.E.C. is scheduled to vote on it on Wednesday.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)

lead_paragraph: Wall Street is bracing for major changes from a new rule that would overhaul how the banking industry conducts its trading.

headline.main: Banking Industry Revamp Moves Step Closer to Law
